oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Robertson Academy historic marker, Nashville, Tennessee, 1981 July
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An historic marker for Robertson Academy that reads: “Was established by an Act of Tennessee General Assembly Sept. 13, 1806, which provided for an academy in each of the then 27 counties. The school has operated continuously since that time.” This marker is located at Robertson Academy Road, south of Harding Place, approximately 7 miles south of Nashville. Forms part of the Claynita Harris Slide Collection. The original is a 35 mm color transparency (2 x 2 in. slide mount)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Robertson Academy (Nashville, Tenn.)
